publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-980 Christine Grahame: Web-cast of Parliament Proceedings-That the Parliament recommends that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body continue web-casts without interruption in order that its broadcasting unit remains at the cutting edge of parliamentary broadcasting.
S1M-980 Web-cast of Parliament Proceedings (lodged on 7 June 2000) Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-980 Christine Grahame: Web-cast of Parliament Proceedings-That the Parliament recommends that the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body continue web-casts without interruption in order that its broadcasting unit remains at the cutting edge of parliamentary broadcasting. Supported by: Alex Neil, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Tommy Sheridan*
